content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-13.0, -48.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0)
- Stone Furnace at position (-13.0, -48.0)
- Stone Furnace at position (-11.0, -48.0)
- Stone Furnace at position (-9.0, -48.0)
- Iron chests at positions (-16.5, -48.5), (-15.5, -48.5), (-14.5, -48.5), (-13.5, -49.5)
- Wooden chests at positions (-12.5, -49.5), (-9.5, -49.5)
- Iron chests for storage at positions (-18.5, -48.5), (-14.5, -47.5)

### Coal Storage and Transfer System at Position (47.5, -80.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Iron chests at positions (41.5, -80.5), (42.5, -80.5), (44.5, -80.5), (45.5, -80.5), (47.5, -80.5), (49.5, -80.5)
- Wooden chest at position (41.5, -79.5)
- Burner Inserters at positions (43.5, -80.5), (41.5, -78.5)
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0)
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when extracting but being too far
- Ensure you are close enough to the target entity before attempting to extract items.

### Errors when clearing furnace outputs
- Make sure the furnace is not full and has space to clear outputs.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure the target tile is free before placing an entity.

### Errors with fuel management
- Regularly check and refuel entities like Burner Mining Drills and Inserters to prevent them from stopping due to lack of fuel.

### Errors with full chests
- Regularly clear out chests that are full to ensure continuous operation of mining drills and inserters.
